summary: Comprehensive end-to-end testing of DDNS.LAND DNS management application completed successfully. Tested both backend APIs and frontend UI with real Cloudflare integration.

design_issues.issue: React hydration warning for nested p tags in Badge component

passed_tests: Backend API health check
User registration and JWT token generation
User login authentication
Protected route authentication (GET /api/auth/me)
DNS records listing (GET /api/dns/records)
DNS record creation with real Cloudflare integration (POST /api/dns/records)
DNS record updates (PUT /api/dns/records/{id})
DNS record deletion (DELETE /api/dns/records/{id})
Free plan limit enforcement (403 error on 3rd record)
Invalid authentication handling (401 errors)
Landing page load with all sections (hero, features, pricing, footer)
Theme toggle (dark/light mode switching)
Language toggle (EN/FA with RTL support)
Navigation between pages (landing, login, register, dashboard)
User registration through UI and redirect to dashboard
Dashboard loading with stats cards and DNS records table
DNS record creation through UI form
DNS record display in table after creation
Free plan limit in UI (Add Record button disabled at 2 records)
Upgrade button visibility and Telegram contact link
Protected dashboard route (redirects to login when not authenticated)
User logout functionality
Telegram contact links in footer and upgrade button

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (23/24 major UI flows passed, 2 minor warnings)
